## Functions

<a id='DynClust.runDenoising' href='#DynClust.runDenoising'>#</a>
**`DynClust.runDenoising`** &mdash; *Function*.



```
runDenoising(dataArray,dataMask,dataVar,depth=1,alpha=0.05,maskSize=nothing)
```

Runs the denoising step.
